price: (Mūsā) sọ pé: “Ẹ ju (tiyín) sílẹ̀ (ná).” Nígbà náà ni àwọn okùn wọn àti ọ̀pá wọn bá ń yíra padà lójú rẹ̀ nípasẹ̀ idán wọn, bí ẹni pé dájúdájú wọ́n ń sáré.
arabic: قَالَ بَلۡ أَلۡقُواْۖ فَإِذَا حِبَالُهُمۡ وَعِصِيُّهُمۡ يُخَيَّلُ إِلَيۡهِ مِن سِحۡرِهِمۡ أَنَّهَا تَسۡعَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla bal alqū fa-idhā ḥibāluhum waʿiṣiyyuhum yukhayyalu ilayhi min siḥ'rihim annahā tasʿā
